articles.author: Erich Richter
articles.title: West Virginia players share cryptic posts after Darian DeVries abruptly leaves for Indiana - New York Post
articles.description: Darian DeVries hiring at Indiana is not without controversy.
articles.content:
Darian DeVries hiring at Indiana is not without controversy.
DeVries was named the next coach in Bloomington just two days after West Virginia was snubbed from the NCAA Tournament in place of North … [+1667 chars]
